data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Arkansas a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Arkansas, United States
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Arkansas to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Arkansas, United States humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 797,731 believers in Arkansas, United States a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Arab, Iraqi people.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Arkansas.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Arkansas, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Arkansas do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.
